reviewText:
This is one of my favorite movies EVER. Its filled with little details what show the people making it cared a lot and had tons of fun creating this masterpiece. UHF is very funny and you always find something new you didn't see before on re-watch. My family and I quote it all the time.
While fashion and technology in it this film don't age well, Weird-Al makes it timeless. Give it a shot if you're a fan of Monty Python and the Holy Grail or Blazing Saddles, or just a fan of Weird-Al himself!
Really funny.  Movie.. I hadn't seen it in a years. Really grat I'm able to add it to my collection.
Smelled like smoke and barley works.
A totally whacked out comedy. Its different and kind of a NB type movie. But of you have a sense of humor, you'll like this cult classic.
